key.name: favorites
key.summary: List of desktop file IDs for favorite applications
key.description: The applications corresponding to these identifiers will be displayed in the favorites panel along with running applications.

key.name: app-filter-mode
key.summary: How to filter apps in the overview. The default 'adaptive' shows only adaptive apps in mobile mode and all apps in docked mode. 'off' turns of all filtering.
key.description: Whether to filter out apps that aren't marked as adaptive in mobile mode.

key.name: force-adaptive
key.summary: List of desktop file IDs for applications that are adaptive for phone usage but not marked as such in their desktop file.
key.description: The applications corresponding to these identifiers will be displayed in the app grid panel even when in mobile mode that only lists touch capable apps that adapt to small screen sizes.

key.name: wwan-backend
key.summary: Which backend to use for interfacing with the cellular modem
key.description: The available backends are 'modemmanager' for ModemManager (the default) and 'ofono' for oFono. This setting is only read when Phosh starts, so a shell restart is required after changing it.

key.name: automatic-high-contrast
key.summary: Whether to switch to HighContrast theme in high brightness conditions
key.description: Setting this to true enables automatic switching to HighContrast on high ambient night levels.

key.name: automatic-high-contrast-threshold
key.summary: The light level (in Lux) to switch to HighContrast theme
key.description: When automatic high contrast is enabled this defines the light level at which to switch.

key.name: shuffle-keypad
key.description: Setting this to true shuffle the digits on the PIN keypad to make eaveysdropping harder.

key.name: lock-screen
key.description: The list of currently enabled plugins on the lock screen.

key.name: enabled
key.description: When this is disabled the shell will not offer emergency call functionality.
